items.title: Trump would have been convicted if not elected, DoJ report says
items.description: A prosecutor says there was enough evidence in the 2020 US election case - but he was scuppered by Trump's win in 2024.

items.title: Rescuers pull six more bodies from South Africa mine
items.description: Hundreds of people have reportedly been underground since a crackdown on illegal mining began last year.

items.title: Spain plans 100% tax for homes bought by non-EU residents
items.description: The measure is meant to help tackle the country's housing crisis, the prime minister said.

items.title: Five takeaways from Smith's report on Trump's 2020 election case
items.description: Trump is accused of inspiring Jan 6 violence but prosecutors thought an incitement charge would be too risky.

items.title: LA brain surgeon saves street from 'apocalyptic' wildfires
items.description: Chester Griffiths says the ferocity of the flames demonstrates the need for residents to be prepared.
